about:
Production & Application Support Analyst | L2 Support | Linux, SQL, AWS | ITIL | Autosys | 24/7 Operations

Production Support Analyst with 2.5 years of experience in the healthcare domain. Skilled in Oracle SQL, SQL Server, Linux, and Shell Scripting, with strong working knowledge of ITIL processes. Hands-on experience in using ServiceNow for incident and request management, Dynatrace for application monitoring, Splunk for log analysis, and Autosys for job scheduling. Proven ability to troubleshoot issues, ensure uptime, and meet SLAs in high-pressure 24/7 environments. Demonstrated strengths in root cause analysis, ticket triaging, customer communication, and team collaboration.

Operating Systems: Linux (RHEL/CentOS), Windows

Scripting & Programming: Shell Scripting (Bash)

Databases: Oracle SQL, SQL Server

Monitoring Tools: Dynatrace, Splunk, Autosys

Ticketing Tools: ServiceNow

Job Scheduling: Autosys

additional tools : WinSCP, PuTTY, SQL Developer, Notepad++

Processes: ITIL (Incident, Problem, Change Management)

I specialize in

Resolving critical incidents with minimal downtime

Automatically daily checks & repetitive tasks

performing RCA and proactive system monitoring
